Rule.name: intent-remove status: responder is dating other
Rule.description: The intent of this social move is to end the responder and other's relationship with each other.

Predicate.name: intent-remove status: responder is dating other

Rule.name: The precondition for this move is that responder and other are dating.

Another constraint is that the responder and the other must be having some sort of relationship troubles (whether that means that %r% is angry at %o%, %r% doesn't love %o% anymore, or %r% is more interested in another person than %o%).

Predicate.name: status(responder, other, cat: feeling bad about someone, -1)
status(responder, other, cat: feeling good about someone, -1)

Effect.PerformanceRealization: Default break up (accept) - just means that the two are no longer dating.
Default break up (reject) - The two are still dating.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %i%, what do you think? Should %o% and I keep trying to make this work, or is it already over?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well... %r%, I don't know what goes on behind the scenes with you two, or how you really feel about each other.
But... from what I've seen, I think you two would be better off apart.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: ... Yes, I think you're right. You're echoing what I've been thinking for a while now.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I thought I might be.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: In fact, I think I'm going to go break it off right now. Excuse me.
%i%, what do you think? Should %o% and I keep trying to make this work, or is it already over?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well... %r%, I don't know what it's really like between you two,but from what I have seen... I think you two would be better off apart.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: ... You know, I don't think I'm ready to give up yet.
Thanks for your advice, %i%, but I think I am going to stick with %pron(o,him,her)% for now.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: As you wish.
%r%, I know it must be hard for you to consider this, but just try to-

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Consider what?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Ummm... breaking up with %o%. Isn't that what we're talking about?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, that! No, I'm not worried about that at all. And I don't think %o% is, either.
Yeah, even though what we had between us is over, we're both confident that we will remain great friends.
I mean, really when I stop to think about it, the only thing to lament is a relationship that turned sour, and not the loss of a person I hold dear. And that's not so bad, is it?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well, no... I guess that's a good way of thinking about it.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I think I see %o% coming this way. I'm going to talk to %gender(o,him,her)% right now, and put this troubled romance behind us.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: So, %r% - I think it may be time to give up on your relationship with %o%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You know... at times I think so too, but I don't think I'm ready to give up on such an amazing friend.
%o% is probably my best friend - we have been through so much, how could we just break up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Umm... I don't know...?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Exactly! My best friend is my %gender(o,girlfriend,boyfriend)%. I wouldn't have it any other way, even if we do have our problems.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Ugh... I guess I'll just have to try harder...
%greeting%, %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, hey %i%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: So, have you decided whether or not you were going to break up with %o%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, right! That %gender(o,prick,thorn in my side)%. Yeah, I guess I'd better go dump the %gender(o,bastard,bitch)%. 'Scuse me!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Ummmm... wow. Harsh.
%greeting%, %r%!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, %i%. %greeting%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: So, have you decided if you're going to dump %o% or not?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You know... %gender(o,he,she)% may be a little %gender(o,prick,bitchy)% at times, and sometimes I feel like I hate him... but there's something endering about that hatred.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Sooo... I'm taking that as a no, then?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah. No.

Rule.name: intent-network down: buddy (responder toward initiator)
Rule.description: The intent of this social move is to lower the buddy network of the responder to the initiator.

Rule.name: If the initiator is already embarrassed, then this move will not show up.

InfluenceRule.name: Shyness adds to the probability that this social move becomes available.
Not being charismatic adds to the probability that this social move becomes available.
Not being confident adds to the probability that this social move becomes available.
If the initiator and the responder don't trust each other enough, the responder is more likely to be fine with making the initiator feel awkward about something s/he said.
If the initiator is shaken, s/he is more likely to do something to embarrass him/herself.
If the initiator is feeling distracted, s/he will be more likely to slip up and do something to embarrass him/herself.
If %i% is arrogant, might be more apt to blundering because of thinking s/he is right all the time.
Items can't embarrass themselves.

Effect.PerformanceRealization: Initiator embarrassed self in front of responder; default effect condition.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: And may your quill always be writing Our story forever and ever, As the sun rises in the east, And the daffodils bloom on the horizon...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Wait, wait. Is that the single by Antigone's Anguish, that new age classical music group?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Actually, yes, it is! Do you know them? They are so amazing! I know all of their songs by heart!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %sweetie%, they are sooo 1922. Get with the times.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah, well... I liked them before they were cool!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Why are you just standing there?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh-uh-well... I was waiting for you to say something.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You need to be more assertive, %i%. Don't let yourself be swept up in the flow of the river of life - swim against the current!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Y-yes %gender,sir,ma'am)%!
%gender(i,These,This)% damn %gender(i,pants,dress)%! I'm positive the seamstress hemmed %gender(i,them,it)% wrong! I can't even-

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey! Watch where you're going!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, I'm so sorry %r%! I must've tripped over my %gender(i,pant leg,skirt)%. Here, let me dust you off-

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: No, that won't be necessary.
What do you want?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh! Well, I wanted to talk to you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You've been wanting to talk to me a lot lately. Why not find someone else to bug for a change?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I'm sorry - I didn't know you felt that way.
Hey, %r%! Do you wanna have sex with me?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What?! %i%, what are you-?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Haha hah hahah ah aha ha, I just wanted to see your face when I said that! I wasn't serious or anything.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well here is my aftermath face. Like it?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Umm... no, not particularly.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well if you don't want to see that face anymore, then keep your shennanigans to yourself.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, %r%! Do you wanna have sex with me?
Haha hah ha ahah hah- wait, what?! What are you-?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hahah hah haha hha hahah! I just wanted to see your face when I said that!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh... heh heh, you got me.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Good joke, %i%! You're super duper funny!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, I just have to say, you are a very respectable individual. I am honored to know you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, %shocked%! Well, I wouldn't go so far as to say that, however-

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, me either! Ha ha ha! It was all just a joke! I really don't think you're that respectable at all! I totally agree with you!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: ...It was just a figure of speech, %i%. I was going to say, 'I wouldn't say that, but thank you.'
Hmph. Now I have to wonder how you really feel.
Hey, %i%, mind if I ask you something?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %random(Sure,Shoot,Go ahead,Ask away,Why not)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Are you a virgin?
Have you ever had sex? With a %gender(i,girl,boy)%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I-I don't-I mean-

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Or, hell, maybe with a %gender(i,boy,girl)%. A lot of people around here swing both ways.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well, I've had my share of- I mean- you know-

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Ah-hah! I knew it! Your are a virgin!
You certainly don't look it. With that body, I was sure someone had snatched you up by now.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Now wait just one minute! I never said I was or wasn't, and you have no right to force it out of me!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %i%. Be a %gender(i,man,woman)%, and own up to your endearing purity. It looks pathetic if you don't.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah, well, that's your opinion...
%greeting%, %r%!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, it's you again. What's-

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: So, I totally heard that that new classical band, Sins of Othello, is going to be playing at that old abandoned opera house outside of town; I was wondering if maybe you'd want to go?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well, gee, thanks for the offer... but I-

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Great! Absolutely great. Hey, does this %pron(i,tie,corset)% %pron(i,do the rest of my suit justice,make my breasts look melon-y)%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well, I don't-

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I guess it doesn' doesn't it? I shouldn't be so self-conscious.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Can I get a word in-

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Word - oh! my word - that reminds me, I need to take care of my Latin homework when I get home from this party, or else my tutor will kill me-
%r%? What is it?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You talk to me way. Too. Much.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, %r%, I'm sorry! I hate to be a bother, I didn't even know that-

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Stop. Just... please. Stop talking.
Oh, %i%, it's you!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, no, it's %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %i%, have I ever told you about the time %random(my rifle jammed in the middle of the trenches during the Great War,I received a dozen letters at once from my wife during the Great War,I had to go four months without so much as a bar of soap during the Great War)%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Here we go...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: It was a rough time, %gender(i,son,miss)%, a rough time for everyone involved, not just the Brits. And to think, I had to go through it all without even %random(proper rifle maintenance,a warm body to scoot next to at night,a proper bathing for months on end)%...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: How do I get %gender(r,this old coot,her)% to shut up?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Excuse me!?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Um... did I just say that out loud?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hmph. Yes, you did.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, %i%

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Umm... isn't your name %i%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh! Right! Whoops! Umm... slip of the tongue?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Haha, don't worry about it.

Rule.name: intent-network up: romance (responder toward initiator)
Rule.description: Intent is to raise the romance network of the responder toward the initiator.

Rule.name: In order for this to happen, the initiator must have a romance network of at least 15 with the responder.

Predicate.name: status(responder, initiator, cat: feeling good about someone, -1)
status(responder, initiator, cat: feeling bad about someone, -1)

Effect.PerformanceRealization: If the responder and initiator have a romance network greater than 40, then they go into the super-flirty dialogue scene, and the initiator feels excited.
If the initiator is shy, and there are no other obstacles (i.e. responder is mean), these effects and instantiation will occur.
If the initiator is domineering and charming, and the responder is meeker, the mean flirt will actually succeed.
Similarly, if the initiator is arrogant and charming, and the responder is meeker, the mean flirt will actually work.
If a domineering initiator tries to flirt with a not shy or meek responder whose romance network is lower than his/hers, then this reject will occur.
Similarly, if an arrogant initiator tries to flirt with a not shy or forgiving responder whose romance network is less than his/hers, then this effect will occur.
Mild flirt 4 (reject) - If the buddy network for %r% to %i% is high but the romance network is not, then %r% will "friend zone" %i%.
Mild flirt 5 (accept) - This cheesy pick up line actually works, and romance network for both %i% and %r% go up.
Another cheesy line, meant to complement the first one, is for romance networks that are a bit higher.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%, %r%. I couldn't help but notice that %gender(r,dashing suit,beautiful dress)% you are wearing. It brings out a side of you that I'd like to see more of.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh! Well I-I mean...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Ah, ah. Say no more, %gender(r,my devilishly handsome devil,my beautiful desert flower)%. Even that %gender(r,nervous smile,slight rouge)% that I detect on your face is more than enough to tide me over until next we meet.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well, my word - you are quite the charmer, aren't you, %sweetie%. I'd like to get to know you a little better myself.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, there's something I've been meaning to tell you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %i%? What is it?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Umm... well... your %random(smile,voice,hair)%... it's very... I think it's...
Well... I just... never mind. I'll tell you some other time.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You're very sweet, %i%. Thank you.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, %sweetie%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Are you talking to me?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Is there anyone else around?

You know, %sweetie%, you would be the most %gender(r,handsome man in the world,beautiful woman in Europe)% if you just %random(fixed that obnoxious overbite,took care of that ghastly case of head lice,somehow managed to remove those three hairs between your eyebrows,saw someone about that hideous case of gangrene betwixt your middle and penultimate toes,dressed a little less like a farm hand and more with the times,manage to look at me with both eyes and get a rein on the one that seems to stray away at times)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well, I-I... don't know what to say to that. Thank you...?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Just some constructive criticism!
Hey, %sweetie%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: My name is %r%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I've been mulling this over for a while now, %sweetie%, and I have decided that I am interested in you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh! Well, I'm flattered. And, to be honest, I've been thinking about you, too, and I-

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: But I cannot act on that attraction until you've %random(fixed that obnoxious haircut,gained a keener sense of fashion,brushed up on the finer points of etiquette,learned a bit more about modern classical music,earned my respect as someone worthy of my tiger-like prowess in bed)%. I do have an image to uphold.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Ugh, you pig! To think that I spared even a thought on the likes of you...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Wait! That's not what I meant!... Actually, yes it was. Every word.
%greeting%, %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, %i%! %greeting%!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I just wanted to say, that %gender(r,shirt,blouse)% you're wearing looks really %positiveAdj% on you. It brings out your eyes.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh! Well, thank you very much, %i%, that's %gender(r,nice,sweet)% of you to say.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%, %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, %i%. What's up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I just was noticing that the %gender(r,shirt,blouse)% you're wearing really compliments your figure. It looks good on you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Don't you mean, it looks 'well' on me?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: What? No, that's not what I mean.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Insulting my intelligence now, are you? Is this how you go about paying %gender(r,someone,a lady)% a compliment?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: ...Nevermind. I think I'll just... go now...
Hey, umm, %r%? There's something 've been meaning to tell you for a while now...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Really? What is it?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well, umm... I can't exactly just-

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Come on, spit it out!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Alright! Well, you see, I, umm... I mean, you... I think... uhmm...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You're not making any sense.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I... well... you're right. Just forget I said anything.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: In the future, please don't waste my time like this.
Woah, %i%! Watch where you're going there, %sweetie%. You almost knocked me over.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Ohhh, I was watchin. That was a very concoted stumble.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I think you mean 'calculated.'

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Or do I...? *hic*

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Haha, alright then. Don't fall down any wells; I'd like to talk to you when you're sober.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You know, %r%, it never really occurred to me until just now, but...
It is quite a privilege to be able to spend time with you like this.
Indeed, even knowing you is something I am happy that I can say.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: And what prompted this burst of compliments?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You are a great person, %r%. That's what prompted it. And I hope I can get to know you better while I am at this manor.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well... thank you, %i%. I will try to make that happen.
So, %i%, if you could have anything in the world at this moment, what would it be?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Why, t'would be more time to spend with you, my %gender(r,good sir,lady)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Ahhh, smooth. Very smooth.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%, %r%. You're looking well.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Umm... thank you.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: And by 'well,' I mean %gender(r,handsome,very pretty)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %i%, please...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: What? Did I say something wrong?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I don't even know you well enough to know how I feel about you saying... things like that, about me.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh... I understand.
%greeting%, %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %greeting%, %i%! What's up, buddy?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You're looking really %pron(r,handsome,pretty)% today.

Yeah, I never really noticed before, but %random(your hair sometimes falls over your eyes and it's kind of cute,the color of your hair really brings out your eyes; and they're beautiful,your clothing is hiding a really good figure)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey! Hey hey - you're not supposed to say that kind of stuff about me! We're friends - %gender(r,bros,amigos)% - got it?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh. Uhh... right. %gender(r,Bros,Amigos)%.
%greeting%, %r%. Can I ask you a quick question?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Sure. What's on your mind?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Did it hurt?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What do you mean?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I mean, did it hurt when you fell from heaven, you %positiveAdj% angel?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %i%, you are the cheesemeister.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%, mind if I ask you something?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %gender(r,Shoot,Sure... go ahead)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Did it hurt?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, jeez, you have got to be kidding me... of all the cheesiest-

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: What? No, I was asking about your heart transplant. Did it go alright?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What? I think you've got me confused for someone else, I haven't-

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Because I could be wrong, but I think I stole yours a while back. You'd require a new one, yes?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Haha, okay, I guess I can admit that cheesy can be cute sometimes.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, you're really pretty, you know that?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hmmm... prettier than %random(Gloria Swanson,Coco Chanel,Zelda Sayre,Chrissie White,Betty Compson)%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Of course. A hundred times prettier, in fact.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You're too sweet, %sweetie%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You know, %r%...
I've gotten to know you pretty well during my stay at this manor, and well... I know there are still some things you need to learn...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Wh-what? What kinds of things?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: The kinds of things we can learn together... you, me, and a bale of hay with our names on it...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: ... I think I need a cold shower.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, %sweetie%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, hi, %sweetie%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I love the way you %random(look, smell)% right now. It reminds me of that time when we-

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %i%, I'm not in the mood for that right now.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, c'mon, %r%, you know you love it when I %random(kiss,snuggle,hold)% you like this-

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %i%, stop! Just... stop.
I just can't do this with you right now... you can't just act like nothing happened...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%... I'm sorry...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Please, give me some space for now.

Rule.name: intent-network up: buddy (responder toward initiator)
Rule.description: The intent of this game is for the responder's buddy network toward the initiator to go up.

Rule.name: If %i% is sad, %i% will not want to joke around.
%i% also can't be angry at %r%, or else this move will not come up.

Predicate.name: status(responder, initiator, cat: feeling bad about someone, -1)
status(responder, initiator, cat: feeling bad about someone, -1)

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, %r%. This manor party is a little stuffy for my taste.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh? And what would you do to make it a little livelier?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well, for starters, I would %random(throw some streamers around to make things more colorful,play some Antigone's Anguish on that baby grand over there and fail miserably at singing the lyrics,invite all the guests to join in a conga line with me at the font)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Haha, yes, I do believe that would liven things up.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: And then I would take a cue from this one ball I went to where %random(the host actually brought out live tigers for the guests to pet,the host brought out a fountain of champagne for the amusement of the guests,a fireworks display marked the highlight of the night)%, and then I'd-

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hahaha, alright, %i%, I think I've had enough of your suggestions for now.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Ah, so you'll implement them?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Perhaps. Though %random(tigers,a fountain of champagne,fireworks)% inside of the manor might be where I draw the line.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, %r%, what's your favorite thing about being at this manor party?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: That's kind of an odd question... I guess I'd say meeting new people and learning more about people I already know is quite intriguing. Why?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Ah, well, I was just gonna say that my favorite part is checkin' out all the %gender(i,beautiful women,handsome men)%. Am I right? You know I'm right.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: ... You disgust me.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%, %r%. Do you have a minute?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Sure, %i%. What's up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Where do you keep it?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: ... What?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You said you had a minute, so I asked... where do you... never mind.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Ha ha, maybe work on your material a bit, eh %i%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Heh, will do.
%greeting%, %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, %i%. What's up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I think you have something on your %gender(r,blouse,shirt)%...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, really? Where?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Here. Look.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: ... Oh, %i%. You are... too funny.
No. Now get out of my personal space.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, %r%. Did you catch that %random(Antingone's Anguish,Sins of Othello,Flying Chickpeas)% concert last month?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: No, though I heard it was crazy. Why?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well, I was there, and the craziest thing happend! %random(The lead pianist had a panic attack in the middle of his big crescendo and had to be escorted offstage,Some crazy fan fainted because the lead pianist winked at her from the stage,Half of the people who arrived couldn't get in because their tickets were fakes)%! Can you believe that?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Haha, yeah that does sound crazy.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hehe, I thought you might get a kick out of that.
%r%, I have a joke for you that I hope you will find most amusing.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Ummm... ok. Go ahead.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: What is a word that, if you pronounce it wrong, is right, and if you pronounce it right, is wrong?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Ummm, I don't know. Cheese?
Okay, so what's the answer then?
I know I'm wrong... so what's the answer to the riddle?
Jeez, you don't have to be a jerk about it! I'm leaving!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: But... I meant... the answer was actually wrong...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, do tell.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well, I think it's high time that you left that %gender(o,simpleton,frog of a woman)% %o% and hitched your cart to the %i% train instead.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, %i%! %random(Bold,Brash,Arrogant) as ever, I see.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I wouldn't be if I thought that my request had a chance of being revoked. Now, what say you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I say... nay.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Nay? But why?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Come now, %i%, it's one of the most unattractive things for a %gender(i,man,woman)% to be caught begging.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well, you'll have no more romance from me in the future, that much is certain.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, %i%! The way you %random(touch me behind the ear like that,kiss my ear lobe,kiss my neck so tenderly,breathe on my neck just so)% always %random(feels so good,gives me chills)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I know it does. Here let me do it some more.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %gender(r,Tee-hee!,Oh yeah, that's the spot.)%
You know, %o% never makes me feel like this. %gender(o,He,She)% doesn't know half of my sweet spots that you know!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well, I am not one to brag, but... you are special to me, so I expend the effort to know you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: That's it! I know what my heart wants, %i%, and it's you. You've awakened in me feelings that I've never felt. Both mental and... physical.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I'm glad I could be of assistance, %sweetie%. But are you sure about this decision? It's not one to be made lightly.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: If you're sure about the way you feel about me, I'm sure.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I am.

Rule.name: intent-add status: initiator is dating responder
Rule.description: The intent of this move is to cause the initiator and the responder to have the status "dating."

Predicate.name: intent-add status: initiator is dating responder

Rule.name: One pre-condition of this move is that the initiator and the responder can't already be dating.
Another pre-condition is that the romance network must be high enough for the initiator to want to ask the responder out.
The trust network between the two must also be moderately high.

Predicate.name: status(initiator, responder, cat: feeling bad about someone, -1)
status(responder, initiator, cat: feeling bad about someone, -1)
status(responder, initiator, cat: feeling good about someone, -1)

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, umm... %r%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %i%? What's the matter?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Umm... well, I... had something I wanted to ask you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Go ahead! You know you can ask me anything.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well, this isn't the easiest question to pose...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What do you mean?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Whew, okay, here it goes... %r%, as I've gottetn to know you, I've realized that you're no ordinary %gender(r,man,woman)%. You're... special.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What are you saying?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I'm saying... well, rather, I'm asking... would you like to be my %gender(r,boyfriend,girlfriend)%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, %i%! This is so unexpected!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, don't leave me hanging... that was hard enough to say as it is...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh! I'm sorry! Yes, yes, I'd love to be your %gender(r,man,woman)%. In fact, I've been waiting for you to ask me, %sweetie%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Great! Amazing! %positiveAdj%!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, %i%? What's the matter?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I, umm... well... I had something that I wanted to ask you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Of course, %i%! You know you can ask me anything.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well, this isn't exactly the easiest question to pose...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What do you mean?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Umm, well, I'll just ask then... %r%, as I've gotten to know you, I've realized that you're no ordinary %gender(r,man,woman)%. You're... different.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Different? What do you mean?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I'm saying... well, rather, I'm asking... %r%, would you like to be my %gender(r,boyfriend,girlfriend)%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %shocked%! %i%, this is... unexpected... to say the least...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well hey, don't leave me hanging... that was hard enough to get out as it is...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, umm, well... %i%, you're very sweet, and I've enjoyed my time with you, but...
But... I don't think I'm ready for a relationship with you. I'm sorry.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, um... alright.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Let's not make things awkward, though, alright?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Umm... sure thing.

Rule.name: intent-network down: buddy (responder toward initiator)
Rule.description: intent is to lower the buddy network of the responder toward initiator

Rule.name: A good buddy wouldn't start such an argument...

InfluenceRule.name: initiator can't have a high buddy network with the responder
This doesn't matter as much, but it can't happen unless the responder has a low(ish) budnet too

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: The horses around here are just such an off color. Even the ugliest of horses back in London are more handsome than these at the manor.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: These horses are some of the finest in England! I dont know what %random(devilish film has glazed over your eyes/demon has nested in your poorly shaped chest)% but how can anyone not see the beauty in these fine steeds?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Perhaps it is just your poor taste, %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: it might just be yours. %random(Awful day to you./May you slip in horse feces.)%R:

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: The %random( furniture here/party/food)% is a tad bit bleak dont you think?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Not as bleak as your conversation, Im afraid. %random(Bother someone else with your babble why dont you?/Go mingle or somethingor not, just go elsewhere.)%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You know, %r%, Ill be blunt. Your shoes are just utterly posh.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Are you serious? Friend, I dont have time to get into this right now. Why dont you bug off?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I rather dislike the cutlery here in the manor. Not very pretty for a mansion such as this, dont you think?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Youre mad! The cutlery in our kitchen has passed down over years of the family! They are pristine and to be admiredno, not just admiredrespected! You insignificant ruffian scum!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Ha! Who dies respecting inanimate objects? Filthy ugly ones at that! Your mind is a mess, poor fool.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Your disrespect toward our cutlery is unforgivable! Unforgivable! Go rot in a dung pile you scoundrel!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Its funny how you all are so used to these chilly wintersyouve got thick blood and skin here. Surprises me you dont all get fat to stay further warm.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: No need, good (lass/lad)! Youre rightwe are rather used to these winters, but getting thicker than a cows gut might help too! Good day!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You knowIve been admiring the trim, but the color on the walls is quite dreary.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Haha! *hic* I agree young city walker. *hic* In the moonlight the sun defiles us all with*hic* ponies! Mahaha! It should be blue!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Dont you wish you lived in the city? It is dreadfully uneventful out in these parts

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hardly! The city is filth! Out here the skies are vast, the plains long and luscious, the windunhindered by monstrous buildings!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: My comment was hardly an excuse to attempt poetry, %r%. Youre better off sticking to reading it.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You bloated aggressor! Emancipate yourself from my presence at once!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yes, flower of the night skymy majesty.
Im not a firm supporter of this old rug here.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Mm, thats nicewhy dont you goswimming or something equally less involving me.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Ever notice how stale it smells in here? How can you stand it?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh gracious good %pron(i,lad,lass)%, your tongue is outstandingly irritating. Why dont you go have your way with a steed?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Did my comment offend you oh so very much that you wish me to procreate with a beast?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: If I could, for the moment Id wish you back to the city. Do not spoil our hospitality.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hm, the hedges could use a bit of a trim. Rather ugly now, dont you agree? Funny how you can stand to even look at this place.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Dearest, how can you even make that quip? Lets not argue about such petty things.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: This place is awfully dusty. *cough* Its a wonder all your lungs still function in this drabble.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: It is a wonder you are able to function at all. There is hardly any dust, except maybe in your ears.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: What have ears got to do with it?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Why dont you go elsewhere if youre to speak vile nonsense?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Goodness if the air here were any dryer Id shrivel into an unsightly husk. Miserable place.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Im afraid the air isnt dry at alland your insults to my home are utmost surprising. Lets refrain from pursuing the topic further.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Goodness the grass is certainly dead looking today. Is it always so ghoulish?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You filthy backhanded perpetrator of peace! The grass is as green as your heart is black!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Sonot very green then. Right. That is what I was saying.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Filth! Scum! If youre so interested in the grass turn your head to look at itIll give you something to think about! Bulls-eye in the skull!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hm. Perhaps Ill ask another what they think!
It has been an honor getting to learn so much about you %sweetie%. Perhaps you and I could %random(get to know each other beyond just the outer bits,have ourselves a wrestle in the haystack)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, that would be %random(the most wonderful thing in the world.,the happiest moment of my life!)%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Perfect. See you around then, %sweetie%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Not a moment too soon, %sweetie%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, %random(your eyes are quite lovely I guess,your face isbetter than a horses,you look like you have bigtalent)%. Want to go mingle elsewhere? Somewhere private maybe?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Ugh, you %pron(filthy scoundrel!,miserable wench!)% Thats your idea of courtship?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You dont %random(admire my word craft?,find me illustrious?,want me?)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Not today, %pron(r, city boy,city girl)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, goodness, %r%, funny we run into each other so much isnt it?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I think Ive seen you once, maybe twiceIs something wrong?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Wrong? Gracious noIve just bitten my tongue. See? Mua, mua, la.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: How very odd. Good day to you then.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: My %sweetie%, Id love to run off with you into the plains to be forever lost in our love.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Mmm, my %sweetie%, that is a hard to put down offer. But Im afraid we should stay here at the manor. Twould be rude to abandon such a lovely party.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You are the loveliest of things here %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Youre very kind. %random(Ill accept more gushing another time.,Im always open to your compliments %sweetie%.)%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, Im glad we are close, but %random(do you think we could be something more?,do you want to spend time together inother ways?,have you ever thought of maybe being naughty? With me?)%

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, %sweetie%, %random(Ive certainly thought about it,I wouldnt mindexperimenting,that sounds quite tantalizing)%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hm, cant say I havent thought about myself.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Maybe we can act on those thoughts then. Later. Maybe. See you around, %sweetie%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Goodness, %r%, you are certainly %random(ravishing,tantalizing)% to look at. How ever did you tone those %pron(r, pulsing muscles,marvelous curves)%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %pron(r, Oh my,Teehee!)% What a pleasant compliment. You %random(are quite marvelous to look at as well.,are quite a catch yourself.)%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Thats good to hear, %sweetie%. Lets talk some more.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Lets. *wink*

Rule.name: There must be a trust network somewhere in order for this game to become available.
to blame someone, there must be a little anger

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: How dare you? How could you do that?
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What are you talking about?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You know exactly what I'm talking about. Dont you dare play dumb with me. No one does that and gets away with it! Mark my words, you will regret that.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I'm sorry, wait no, I'm not, I mean, you, shouldnt be mad at meplease?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I am very disappointed with you %sweetie%. How could you? I thought you had more sense than that but I guess I was wrong
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: But but I didnt mean to

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: It doesnt matter what you meant to do. I dont care anymore. You have lost my trust. $neutral$
How dare you? I thought we were closer than that. What you did hurt me yet you barely seem to care.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What are you upset about? I dont remember doing anything wrong

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Don't give me that! I will never forgive you for what you did to me.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: ...Seriously, what I do?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You will regret that, you %gender(r,bastard/bitch)%!
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I highly doubt that any %gender(i,little boy,little girl)% would be able to make me do so.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: When I get through with you, you will be %random(in so much pain, you wont be able to move,the laughing stock of the town,you will never be able to do what you did again)%!
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I would like to see you try but I am not expecting much

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: How could you? I thought you cared about me?
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I'm sorry, I do care about you. It was my mistake. I didnt mean to hurt you.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Then why would you do that? It hurt so much!
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I'm sorry, how can I make it up to you?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well, now that you ask $neutral$
Its all your fault! How could you? I thought you were better than that
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Actually it was not my fault. In fact, I tried to help you but someone stopped me.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: It wasnt? You did? Then whose fault was it and who tried to stop you.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I'm sorry, I can't tell you, its for your own good.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Why did you do that? I mean, it was you right? I can't think of anyone else.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I have no idea what you are talking about. Are you sure you have the right person?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: But didnt you just do that? Wasnt it all your fault?
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What thing? I have no idea what you are talking about.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I see I must have the wrong person $neutral$
How could you? I trusted you!
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I'm sorry, I didnt mean to hurt you, I screwed up.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You're damn right you screwed up! What am I to do now?
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I'm dont know, I'm so sorry.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: How could you? I trusted you!
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You have the wrong person; I dont know what youre talking about.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You dont? I could have sworn it was your fault.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You have the wrong %gender(r,woman,man)%, I swear

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I know that you probably didnt intend to hurt me with your actions but you did.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I'm sorry; I didnt think things would turn out like that. I never intended for you to be hurt.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I understand, and I do forgive you, but please dont do it again. $neutral$

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %gender(r,Sir,Milady)%, may I have the pleasure of your company for this dance?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Really? That sound like it would be %random(smashing,delightful,wornderful)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Great, the let us be off %sweetie%. The dance floor waits.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yes, let us be off.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %sweetie%
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Can I help you?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yes %r%, I was wondering if I may have the pleasure of your company for a dance
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well um, %random(that would be very nice, Id like that, that sounds wonderful)%, but I'm not much to look at.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Nonsense! You are the complete picture of beauty
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %gender(r, I'm not sure if I should be happy about that, You are too kind)%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Um, excuse me %sweetie%
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yes, how can I help you?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well, uh, you see, I was kind of wondering if I could ask you to dance with me.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Ah, well I imagine asking someone of my %random(looks,reputation,influence)% would be quite nerve racking. Hmm, ok why not?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Really? You will really dance with me? Thank you, thank you, thank you!
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Your starting to push your luck.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %sweetie%? May I make a small request tonight?
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hmm, yes, what can I do for you? Ill do my best to help.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You look wonderful this evening, so I was wondering if I could request a dance from you.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Ah, a friendly dance with a friend and not a romantic interest, that sounds %random(fun, like something I would like, enjoyable)%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hello %sweetie%, I am having a wonderful evening
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Wow, I love how every time you say hello, you kiss my hand. It is just like, so retro.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Ah but it gives me an excuse to get closer to %gender%(r,a handsome man such as yourself,a pretty lady like you)%
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Wow, you really dont hesitate to say anything. I love it.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: It's less fun to think things through $neutral$
Uh, excuse me, uh, %sweetie%? I know this is the wrong time since we have already met and all, but I uh, forgot to do it when we did meet and so I was wondering if I could now.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yes? What is it? I'm sure I wont mind.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well it is nothing big, just how I was told to introduce myself when I was younger.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, a kiss on the hand? How very %gender(i,gentlemanly, polite)% of you.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %sweetie%, would you mind joining me for a dance?
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Why do you want to dance with me? There are plenty of other people to dance with.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yes, but out of all the people in the world, the only one I will ever want to dance with is you.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Fine, I understand. I can tell that you want to dance with the best, so allow me to show you my ability.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: We need to dance %sweetie%
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: No, actually we dont. I am quite fine right here, I dont need to do anything.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: What!? Dont you want to dance with me? I'm me afterall!
Lets dance %sweetie!
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Dont touch me. What makes you think I want to dance with someone like you?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I'm sorry, I didnt think-
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Thats right, you didnt think. Ive never much liked you anyway, since youre so rude to those you dislike

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Please %sweetie%, just one dance?
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I'm not interested. Please find someone else to bother.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Come on, please? Id be your best mate?
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: For the last time, No! I dont want to dance with %random(someone as annoying as you, someone as troublesome as you, someone as irritating as you)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Come %sweetie%, let us dance together on this wonderful night and show the world our beauty. Let them gaze at us and be jealous of our enjoyment of life. Let them feel envy that I am dancing with such a wonderful %gender(r,Woman,Man)%. Let-
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Shut Up! Why are you even talking to me? I wouldnt dance with you if you were the last %gender(i,Woman,Man)% on the planet!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Im sorry, I did not realize that you disliked me so much %sweetie%. Surely you can understand my confusion at this sudden turn of events. How can I understand your feelings when I am-

How wonderful it is to see you, %sweetie%. Ah, but you seemed like you have become tense! Would you like me to give you a small massage on this fair night? I have been told that my hands can be simply divine and it would be foolish to leave such a %gender(r,handsome man,fair lady)% such as yourself in such discomfort.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Actually, I must be going now, I think I see someone calling to me. Maybe next time.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Ah I understand, do not worry %sweetie%. I shall eagerly await your return and then I shall take care of it. I will make sure to relax you entire body and reduce your tense mind to a nice calm Hey, where did %gender(r,he,she)% go? $neutral$
Ah %sweetie%, may I give you a massage, you look a bittense.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You seem like you have some ulterior motive. You wouldnt be just trying to get your hands on my body would you?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Huh? Oh, I, uh, mean, of course not! How can you think that?
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I dont believe you, You sick pervert!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %sweetie%, would you honor me with a dance? You look wonderful tonight
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Thank you, but actually, I just recently stopped dancing, so I will have to pass.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: That is disappointing, maybe in a few hours?
Hey *hic* %sweetie%
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Um hi, %i%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I *hic* just wanted to say that you *hic* are %gender(r,handhand really hot,beutbeutreally purtty)% tonight.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Thank you, I, um, appreciate it. Did you drink so much so you can say that?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah *hic*, thats why I wanted to ask all three *hic* of you to dance.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I see. Why dont you wait over there and after I get you something to sober up we can talk.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey *hic* %sweetie%
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Eww, you smell disgusting. What did you drink to make you like this? Hopefully you will go away quickly and leave me in peace. I just can't stand drunkards.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Will *hic* you dance with me?
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Damn it! The answer is no. No way in hell am I going to dance with someone that would likely trip over their own feet not to mention my own. Or even worse, you might get you stench on me. That would be awful and ruin the entire evening

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Fine, you *hic* dont need to get so mad. $neutral$
Hey %r%, how are you enjoying the evening?
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Its *hic* wonderful. I *hic* am having so much fun

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Thats great. Anyway, come dance with me, you will enjoy it, I promise
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: *Hic* You better not be trying to *hic* take advantage of my *hic* hot body

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh you say the funniest things. $neutral$
Hey %r% can I ask you something?
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Sure %i%, what do you need?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Actually, I want to do something for you. You look really tense, do you want a massage? I have been told I am quite good at them. It might help you relax instead of worry about whatever it is that you are worrying about.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: That sounds really nice actually; I could use one to take my mind off things

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Then lets go somewhere more comfortable and Ill get to work. $neutral$

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Ugh, my life has been such a mess lately. Everything is going wrong

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Dont worry. Youre strong! I know you will pull through.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Wow, I think you actually believe that and arent just running your mouth. Thank you.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Dont mention it. I'm just telling the truth. You can definitely do it $neutral$

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Does this outfit %random(show too much skin,make me look fat,seem out of style)%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Dont worry %sweetie%. It looks great.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I want to believe you, but what if that is just your opinion, what if everyone else thinks otherwise?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Stop thinking things like that. You look fine in that outfit.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Really? You are absolutely sure?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %sweetie%, You look amazing $neutral$

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Um, uh do you think I look okay in this outfit, I feel that it might be a little trampish

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I'm sure that is all in your head. You look fine.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Really? I dont look like a cheap %gender(r,man whore,whore)%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: No, you look like a fine %gender(r,man,lady)% $neutral$

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Ugh, I need to find someone to dance with.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Um I'm sure you will find one. You are quiet %gender(r,handsome,pretty)% and I'm sure everyone will want to dance with you.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, I know that quite well, it is just annoying to have to wait for the right one and then turn down all of the other interested dancers after I make it clear that I want to dance.
I think Im getting a bit fat.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: No youre not. Look, youre thinner than I am.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Maybe, but I really think I should %random(do 100 pushups,do 100 situps,run 10 miles,benchpress 100 pounds,maybe drink some powerthirst)% after the party is over.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: But any more muscles would ruin your figure. Its just right now.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You sure? I still think I could gain a little more muscle.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Im positive. $neutral$

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Are you enjoying my company tonight?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Um, uh, sure. Im really, uh, having a smashing good time. Why wouldnt I be?
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: : I can't imagine a reason either. Someone told me you looked bored, but I was sure you were enjoying yourself since you were with me.
Ugh, I have been %random(gaining so much weight lately, feeling so stressed, losing to much hair)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh really, Thats nice %sweetie%
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Wow, really? Thats it? Youre not even going to listen to me?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Sure, sure, of course %sweetie%
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You are a real piece of work. I just can't believe you sometimes.
I think this outfit might be %random(too small, show too much skin, make my butt look big)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Dont worry. Anyone can wear that outfit.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You didnt say I was wrong.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I didnt intend to %sweetie% $neutral$

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Should I get another glass of wine? I am feeling a bit parched.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I think you have had enough.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You sure? I want more, but if you think I have had enough, maybe I should stop. But what if I am dehydrated? Then it would be foolish to stop.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Youre rambling; I think you have had enough $neutral$

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Are you enjoying my company tonight?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Um, uh, sure. Im really, uh, having a smashing good time.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I can't say I really believe you. If you dont want to be around me fine, but the feeling is becoming mutual as well.
I'm feeling a bit overweight in this outfit. Does it make me look fat?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: The outfit doesnt change how you look.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: But you didnt deny that I'm overweight.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You asked me about the outfit, I responded.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh dont worry. I get what you are saying.

Do you think tonight has been fun? You must think it has been dreadfully dull. I mean, I know I am not the best of company but I had hoped I would be able to keep you entertained despite my shortcomings.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Dont worry, it has been-
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh I know it has been dreadful. You dont have to tell me. I totally understand. I mean, your such an interesting individual and you must have so many better things to do than spend time talking to someone like me who can be very annoying and dull, not to mention depressing or overwhelming. I have been told it is quite hard to get a word in edge wise
Ugh, my life has been such a mess lately.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Dont worry. Youll pull through and then this will all be in the past.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You have a lot of faith in me. You really think I can?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Of course! You can do it. $neutral$

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Ugh, my life has been such a mess lately.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You can probably pull through, if you put in some effort that is.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You dont sound very confident in me

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I'm not. $neutral$

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Do you think tonight has been fun? You must think it has been dreadfully dull. I mean, I know I am not the best of company but I had hoped I would be able to keep you entertained despite my shortcomings. I expect though that wasnt enough though so maybe we can do something else. Lets see, we can-

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%! Calm down. Its been a lovable evening so far and I thoroughly enjoyed your company. I will admit, you talk quite a lot, but thats not necessarily a bad thing. Just let me get a word in edgewise in the future shall we?
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Ah, I see. Sorry %sweetie%.
Um, uh do you think I look okay in this outfit, I feel that it might be a little trampish

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: dont worry, there is nothing trampish about the outfit.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Why did you hesitate? And why are you not looking me in the eye?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: No reason, none at allThe outfit looks fine. $neutral$

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Did you see me out on the dance floor a movement ago? I made a complete fool of myself. Everyone is probably laughing at me.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: They are not laughing with you, there laughing at you.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I hope you meant to say that the other way around; otherwise I will be quite annoyed.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Ah, uhoops? $neutral$

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You know, I think I'm getting a bit tipsy. Maybe I should cut back a bit.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Of course not, the evening has just begun! Here, let me get you some more. Parties are always more fun the more you drink. Dont stop now.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Are you sure? I think I really am starting to feel it.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Youll be fine. Here, we will do it together. On the count of three, 123! $neutral$

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You have a marvelous taste in outfits %sweetie%, I love how that one fits your body.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh its nothing much. Just an old outfit I found in the closet.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: It still looks amazing on you. I'm guessing all the other %gender(r,men,women)% are feeling quite jealous $neutral$

%sweetie%, you look absolutely stunning tonight. You fill out that %gender(r,suit,dress)% so well I can't stop looking at you. I mean, not a single person in this room comes close to overshadowing your %gender(r,incredible good looks,breathtaking beauty)%.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, I know it, but keep talking, I'm enjoying it.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yes, you are more %gender(beautiful than any girl,more handsome than any guy)% I have ever met and it has been an absolute joy to be with you tonight. In fact, I imagine half the %gender(I,guys,girls)% in this room are envious of me right now. $neutral$
%sweetie%, I dont know if you have noticed, but I have to say, you have some very %random(straight teeth,adorable ears, kind looking eyes), which are some of the best I have ever seen.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Thank you. I have never noticed that.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: And no one has told you?
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: No, I imagine they noticed other features

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Um, %sweetie%?
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yes? Dont worry, I am listening to you.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I, uh, just wanted to say, uh, that I think youre really %random(cool, inspiring)% and I want to aspire to be more like you.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Thank you, but dont sell yourself short, your pretty awesome youself.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Wow, I saw you on the dance floor just now. You looked very graceful.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, it was nothing; you must have just seen me at a good time. I am usually not that good.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Are you kidding? You were great! I couldnt take my eyes off you. The way you were dancing with that other %gender(r,man,women)% was quite riveting.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You flatter me too much. $neutral$

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You look absolutely stunning tonight, %sweetie%.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Really? You think so? I thought I was kind of blending into the background.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: No, youre standing out so much, everyone just can't stop staring.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, um, thats not good. Can you maybe hide me then? I'm not good with that kind of attention.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %sweetie%, I want you to know, you have very %random(straight teeth,adorable ears, kind looking eyes)%.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Huh, that kind of seems like you were reaching desperately. If you can't come up with a good compliment, just dont say anything.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Im sorry. Ill try not to do it again.. $neutral$
Wow %sweetie%, you look like you are almost good enough to stand next to me. I'm glad.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Whats that supposed to mean?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I just think you have improved yourself despite not having as much to work with.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You %gender(i,bastard,bitch)%! Go %random(jump off a cliff,die in a ditch,ice your head to stop the swelling)%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %sweetie% how is the evening going?
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Its good hey %sweetie%? What do you think of my outfit?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Its verynice. I reallylike it?
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You know you dont lie very well.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I know, I'm sorry $neutral$

%sweetie%, you look absolutely stunning tonight. You fill out that %gender(r,suit,dress)% so well I can't stop looking at you. I mean, not a single person in this room comes close to overshadowing you.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Thank you, I appreciate it.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: : Yes, you are more %gender(r,more handsome than any guy,beautiful than any girl)% I have ever met and it has been an absolute joy to be with you tonight. In fact, I imagine half the %gender(I,guys,girls)% in this room are envious of me right now.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Anyone ever tell you that you talk too much? Its kind of annoying

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Um, %sweetie%?
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yes? Speak up! I dont have time to wait for you all night.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, well, uh, just wanted to say, uh, that-
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Stop stuttering. Youre not a kid. Act your age, you should know how to talk by now.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I imagine you have a very attractive face, pity you have to wear such an ugly mask.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I dont understand, I'm not wearing a mask.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Really? But then thats your real face?
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You will regret that.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You look great tonight %sweetie%
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Really? You think so?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Of course, everyone thinks so, they can't stop looking at you.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I dont know about that, but its nice to hear it, thank you.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You look adequate tonight I guess.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Dont try too hard, you might pull something.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well if you insist. $neutral$
I must say %r%, you are a marvelous conversationalist. I have really enjoyed talking to you tonight.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Thank you %sweetie%. Honestly, I have just been rambling. I'm glad you have been enjoying my company.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yes, your stories are fascinating; you have had such an interesting life. Compared to you, my life has been quite dull.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I'm sure yours is a lot more interesting then you think.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %sweetie% this might sound odd, but I wanted to tell you that I think you have some very fascinating hands.
Yes, I noticed your hands when we shook earlier this evening, they are so %gender(r,rough and worn,soft and small)%. They tell me a lot about you.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Really? Like what?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I can tell that you are really someone who %gender(r,works hard with his hands,takes good care of herself)%. I think they suit you. $neutral$
You have such nice legs %sweetie%. I can't take my eyes off of them
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Um, thank you?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yes, they are so %gender(r,firm and hard,soft and supple)% looking I can't help but want to run my hands over them.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh, %i%, I am not really comfortable with this conversation, can we please change it? I would really appreciate it.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You have such beautiful eyes %sweetie%, I can't stop looking into them.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Thank you. No one has ever said that to me. It makes me happy since I have always thought they were quite plain.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Youre kidding; theyre so vivid and seem so deep.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Thanks a lot, now I want to go find a mirror.

Rule.name: What it means for the initiator to be vengeful

InfluenceRule.name: a vengeful person is more likely to play buddy, romance, trust, and family down games if they are angry at, resentful toward, or envious of the responder (this will be reflected in the next batch of IRSs until the next description).
A vengeful person is more likely to play buddy, romance, and trust down games if the person hates or is enemies with the responder.
A vengeful person is a little less likely to play a network down move with a friend or a lover, even if they are angry at, resentful toward, envious, enemies with, or hateful of them.
a vengeful person is more likely to initiate an enemy-creating move or a friendship- or relationship-ending move if they are angry at or resentful toward a responder.

Rule.name: What it means for the initiator to be irritable

Rule.name: What it means for the initiator to be arrogant. Note: the definition for arrogant is 'having or revealing an exaggerated sense of one's own importance or abilities.' Rule.name: What it means for the initiator to be vulnerable

InfluenceRule.name: A vulnerable person is more likely to play a trust up game, because they are looking for someone to put their trust in.

A vulnerable person is a little more likely to play network up games with a friend or a lover.

Rule.name: What it means for the initiator to be persuasive

InfluenceRule.name: A persuasive person knows just when to play a certain social move; that is, a persuasive person will only play a social move when they know that it has a reasonably high chance of succeeding.

Being persuasive is not only about knowing when to play the right moves, it is also about knowing when to not play games. A persuasive person knows when to not play certain games that might end in failure.

Rule.name: What it means for the initiator to be tactful

InfluenceRule.name: A tactful person knows when to play the right moves; that is, they will maximize their probablility of success by only playing moves when the networks and statuses are in their favor. To start with, a tactful person will not play a network down move if they know that the responder is feeling bad.
Conversely, a tactful person will play network up moves when the responder is feeling good, thus up-ing the chances of the success of the move.
A tactful person will only play moves that attempt to gain friends or relationships if they know that they are almost certain to succeed.
